<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Svetocher](/Feats.aspx?ID=1338) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You were born to one of the moroi, the most common vampires, and you share their supernatural fortitude and power of persuasion. When you have the [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) condition, calculate the penalty to your Fortitude saves and your Hit Point reduction as though the condition value were 1 lower. You are trained [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6). If you would automatically be trained in it, you instead become trained in a skill of your choice.

<title level="2">Svetocher leads to...</title>
[Taste Blood](/Feats.aspx?ID=2349)
